description: OIDCCookieNames defines the names of cookies to use in the Envoy OIDC filter.

accessToken.description: The name of the cookie used to store the AccessToken in the [Authentication Request](https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#AuthRequest). If not specified, defaults to "AccessToken-(randomly generated uid)"

idToken.description: The name of the cookie used to store the IdToken in the [Authentication Request](https://openid.net/specs/openid-connect-core-1_0.html#AuthRequest). If not specified, defaults to "IdToken-(randomly generated uid)"
